column4: 母親(自己的), mother(When talking about your own mom)

父親(自己),father (When talking about your own father)

妻子(別人),wife (when referring to someone else's wife)
這兒(方位), this side / this place (polite) this place (polite)
那兒(方位), that side / that place (polite) that place (polite)
後天, the day after tomorrow
星期幾, what day of the week
